00066 #ifndef HASHSTRING_H_JUL_10_2004
00067 #define HASHSTRING_H_JUL_10_2004
00068 
00069 #include <string>
00070 #include <ext/hash_set>
00071 #include <ext/hash_map>
00072 using namespace __gnu_cxx;
00073 #include "hasharray.h"
00074 
00075 class HashString
00076 {
00077  public:
00078   size_t operator()(string const& str) const
00079   {
00080     return hash<char const *>()(str.c_str());
00081   }
00082 };
00083 
00084 class EqualString
00085 {
00086  public:
00087   bool operator()(string const & s1, string const & s2) const
00088   {
00089     return (s1.compare(s2)==0);
00090   }
00091 };
00092 
00093 typedef hash_set<string, HashString, EqualString> StringSet;
00094 typedef hash_map<string, int, HashString, EqualString> StringToIntMap;
00095 typedef HashArray<string, HashString, EqualString> StringHashArray;
00096 
00097 
00098 #endif
